ground_truth.name: FinishAction

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'NewEnergyCar.get_financing_methods', 'description': 'Get the common financing methods in the new energy car industry.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'methods', 'description': 'the list of common financing methods in the new energy car industry.'}]}, {'name': 'NewEnergyCar.get_financing_cases', 'description': 'Get some financing cases of new energy car companies.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'cases', 'description': 'the list of financing cases of new energy car companies.'}]}, {'name': 'NewEnergyCar.get_financing_trends', 'description': 'Get the current financing trends in the new energy car industry.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'trends', 'description': 'the current financing trends in the new energy car industry.'}]}, {'name': 'NewEnergyCar.get_financing_advice', 'description': 'Get financing advice based on a specific new energy car project.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'project_details', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'details of the new energy car project'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'advice', 'description': 'financing advice based on the project details.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名企业家，正在筹备一个新能源汽车项目。我想了解新能源汽车的融资情况。首先，获取新能源汽车行业常见的融资方式。然后，获取一些新能源汽车企业的融资案例。接着，获取当前新能源汽车行业的融资趋势。最后，基于我的新能源汽车项目，提供一些融资建议。
获取新能源汽车行业常见的融资方式
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
NewEnergyCar.get_financing_methods
当前工具的参数有哪些?
无参数
{'methods': ['Venture Capital', 'Private Equity', 'IPO', 'Government Grants', 'Strategic Partnerships']}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'methods': ['Venture Capital', 'Private Equity', 'IPO', 'Government Grants', 'Strategic Partnerships']}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取一些新能源汽车企业的融资案例
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
NewEnergyCar.get_financing_cases
当前工具的参数有哪些?
无参数
{'cases': [{'company': 'Tesla', 'method': 'IPO', 'amount': '$226 million'}, {'company': 'NIO', 'method': 'Venture Capital', 'amount': '$1 billion'}]}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'cases': [{'company': 'Tesla', 'method': 'IPO', 'amount': '$226 million'}, {'company': 'NIO', 'method': 'Venture Capital', 'amount': '$1 billion'}]}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取当前新能源汽车行业的融资趋势
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
NewEnergyCar.get_financing_trends
当前工具的参数有哪些?
无参数
{'trends': ['Increasing focus on sustainability', 'Rising interest from international investors', 'Government policies encouraging green financing']}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'trends': ['Increasing focus on sustainability', 'Rising interest from international investors', 'Government policies encouraging green financing']}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
基于我的新能源汽车项目，提供一些融资建议
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
NewEnergyCar.get_financing_advice
当前工具的参数'project_details'的值是什么?
我的新能源汽车项目专注于开发高效能、低成本的电动汽车，目标市场为中高端消费者。

{'advice': ['Consider strategic partnerships with established automotive companies', 'Explore government grants and subsidies for green technology', 'Leverage venture capital for rapid growth and market expansion']}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'advice': ['Consider strategic partnerships with established automotive companies', 'Explore government grants and subsidies for green technology', 'Leverage venture capital for rapid growth and market expansion']}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 提供融资建议给新能源汽车项目。
